title: 20 years later: Intel gets $5B lifeline; from company it wouldn't buy
description: Two decades after Intel declined to acquire Nvidia for $20 billion, the tables have turned. Nvidia is now investing $5 billion in Intel, forging a chip partnership where Intel will embed Nvidia's graphics and manufacture AI processors. This deal highlights Nvidia's rise to AI dominance, while Intel seeks relevance through collaboration after missing the AI revolution.

This collaboration aims to boost Intel, which has faced financial struggles, while expanding Nvidia's reach in the AI market.

Deep Earth anomaly: GRACE satellites reveal mantle shifts; core linked to magnetism
description: A recent study reveals dynamic transformations in Earth's lower mantle, impacting both earthquakes and the magnetic field. GRACE satellites detected a gravitational anomaly in 2007, linked to a mineral phase change that increased mantle density. This deformation of the core boundary coincided with unusual magnetic field disturbances, suggesting a connection between deep mantle activity and Earth's surface phenomena.

description: At 50, Shilpa Shetty reveals her secret weapon against stress: Bhramari Pranayama, or bee breath. She credits this simple breathing technique for maintaining balance, improving mental clarity, and staying calm amidst a busy lifestyle. The practice involves deep breathing with a bee-like humming sound, effectively reducing anxiety and regulating blood pressure.

'Low quality': PCB accused of corruption; ex-player launches attack
description: Former Atiq-uz-Zaman criticised the PCB for providing substandard jerseys during the Asia Cup 2025, contrasting them with the dry-fit kits of other teams. Despite Pakistan's Super Four qualification after defeating UAE, Captain Salman Ali Agha acknowledged batting concerns, particularly in the middle overs. Agha emphasised the need for improvement before their crucial match against India on September 21.

description: Google's Gemini 2.5 Deep Think achieved a gold-medal performance at the 2025 International Collegiate Programming Contest (ICPC) World Finals, solving 10 out of 12 problems. The AI tool even cracked a problem that no human team could solve, demonstrating a significant leap in abstract problem-solving. If ranked, Gemini would have secured 2nd place overall in the prestigious competition.

The lawsuit claims the switches' design led to accidental activation, cutting engine power shortly after takeoff. Despite meeting regulatory requirements, the switches' placement is questioned, though experts deem accidental activation unlikely.

description: The Israel Defense Forces (IDF) released video footage of an airstrike on a Hamas weapons storage facility in Gaza City. Guided by Division 98 forces and the Shin Bet, the strike targeted explosives intended for use against Israeli soldiers. Divisions 162 and 98 are intensifying operations in Gaza City, destroying Hamas infrastructure and eliminating militants.

'Mobiles, software used': Rahul explains how Aland saw massive voter deletions
description: Rahul Gandhi presented evidence of mass voter deletions in Karnataka's Aland constituency, alleging a coordinated, software-driven operation targeting Congress voters before the 2023 elections. He highlighted instances of fraudulent deletion applications, unusual timings, and the use of mobile numbers from outside Karnataka. Gandhi asserted that these deletions were strategically focused on Congress-stronghold booths, indicating a deliberate attempt to disenfranchise voters.

'No deletion can be done online': EC calls Rahul's vote-chori charge 'baseless'
description: The Election Commission of India refuted Rahul Gandhi's claim of mass vote deletion in Karnataka's Aland. The poll body clarified that online vote deletion by the public is impossible. It emphasized that deletions require a hearing for the affected person. Rahul Gandhi accused the Chief Election Commissioner of protecting those who undermine democracy. He alleged systematic targeting of opposition voters through centralized software.

Murthy allegedly harassed her during a trip to Thailand in 2023. He also promised her medals and placements. The police registered a case under the POCSO Act.

description: Rahul Gandhi escalated his criticism of Election Commission's chief Gyanesh Kumar, accusing him of protecting those who are destroying Indian democracy and systematically targeting minority and Dalit voters for deletion. He alleged centralized vote deletion in Karnataka, citing thousands of impersonator applications targeting Congress voters. Gandhi previously accused the EC of colluding with the BJP to steal elections, highlighting alleged voter fraud in Karnataka's Mahadevapura constituency.

Rupinder was killed to prevent her from filing a case against Charanjit after he backed out of marriage. Sukhjit allegedly bludgeoned her, burnt the body, and disposed of the remains in a canal.

Stricter rules, including tougher reviews and neighborhood investigations, are also being rolled out to ensure eligibility and good moral character.

description: Several ABC affiliate stations will broadcast a tribute to conservative figure Charlie Kirk. This follows controversy over Jimmy Kimmel's remarks about Kirk's alleged assassin. The controversy has drawn attention from the FCC and President Donald Trump.

description: A pedestrian was fatally struck by a Delhi Police PCR van in the Thana Mandir Marg area on Thursday morning. Police report that the driver of the van accidentally accelerated, causing the vehicle to mount a ramp and hit the individual.

Rajasthan: Mom kills child by throwing her into Ana Sagar Lake; arrested
description: In a shocking incident in Ajmer, a woman has been arrested for allegedly killing her 3-year-old daughter by throwing her into Ana Sagar Lake. Anjali Singh, who had left her husband in Varanasi to live with another man, initially misled the police. However, CCTV footage revealed inconsistencies in her statements, leading to her confession.

title: Cardiovascular toll of COVID: Millions at risk, new report reveals prevention tips
description: A new report highlights the profound cardiovascular impact of COVID-19 and long COVID, affecting millions globally. It emphasizes continued vaccination programs and structured cardiac rehabilitation to prevent long-term complications and boost recovery. The study calls for increased investment in rehabilitation services to ensure equitable access for all patients, addressing the ongoing burden on healthcare systems.

title: Exclusive | Handshake row: PCB's emails to ICC, closed door meeting & Pycroft's non apology
description: Amidst uncertainty surrounding Pakistan's Asia Cup participation, the PCB demanded match referee Andy Pycroft's removal, alleging code of conduct violations during the India-Pakistan match, specifically regarding the captains not shaking hands. Despite PCB's threats, the ICC stood firm, asserting Pycroft followed ACC instructions and didn't violate any rules.

title: Dehradun floods: Farmer clings to 50m pole for 5 hours above raging river
description: In a dramatic rescue, Desh Pal, stranded on an electricity pole for five hours amidst a raging river in Dehradun, was saved by an NDRF team. Head constable Manmohan Singh, known for his Silkyara tunnel rescue expertise, executed a daring monkey crawl to reach the exhausted Pal.

title: UP: Husband hacks 7-month pregnant wife to death
description: In Lucknow's Gudamba, Ankur Lodhi murdered his pregnant wife, Neelam. He used a baanka during a domestic dispute. The attack also injured his mother, Phoolmati, who tried to intervene. Locals apprehended Ankur and handed him to the police. The incident occurred after Ankur participated in a Vishwakarma Puja event. Police have arrested Ankur Lodhi.

title: Goa ka ‘haunted airport’: YouTuber Akshay Vashisth arrested for comments
description: Goa police arrested Akshay Vashisth in Delhi for posting a video titled ‘Goa ka haunted airport’ on his Facebook channel, ‘Real Talk Clips.’ The video contained false information about Manohar International Airport at Mopa, which was flagged by a police constable.

title: 2 men attempt immolation in front of Ajit Pawar’s convoy
